alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 10:55AM MST until February 21 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ this morning to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and dangerous wave activity on area lakes will create hazardous boating conditions for Lake Mead and Lake Mohave. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves up to 3 feet will be possible today for Lakes Mead and Mohave through the afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
